title: attemting to reconnect
body: what going on with the servers??

replies.body:
Hey Guldvixen, 

Took a look at your region in the EUW servers and nothing seems: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw. What kind of problems are you experiencing, maybe I can help you out! I'll be on for a bit so reach out and let's get you back in the game :)
